long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension keeps you motivated through the day with an endless supply of epic quotes. Each time you click on the extension is gives you a curated quote that is going to give you that extra motivation you're looking for in your dull day.

The extension itself needs no permissions and is super light weight making it a nimble addition to your browser set-up.
